amendment.description: To authorize, with an offset, assistance for prodemocracy programs and activities inside and outside Iran, to make clear that the United States supports the ability of the people of Iran to exercise self-determination over their form of government, and to make enhancements to the Iran-Libya Sanctions Act of 1996.

action.text: Amendment SA 4234 proposed by Senator Santorum.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4234 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 45 - 54. Record Vote Number: 172.
